verses.verse: And Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> and spoke <WG2036> to them again <WG3825> by parables, <WG3850> and said, <WG3004>
The kingdom <WG932> of heaven <WG3772> is like <WG3666> to a certain <WG444> king, <WG935> which <WG3748> made <WG4160> a marriage <WG1062> for his son, <WG5207>
And sent <WG649> forth <WG649> his servants <WG1401> to call <WG2564> them that were bidden <WG2564> to the wedding: <WG1062> and they would <WG2309> not come. <WG2064>

Again, <WG3825> he sent <WG649> forth <WG649> other <WG243> servants, <WG1401> saying, <WG3004> Tell <WG2036> them which are bidden, <WG2564> Behold, <WG2400> I have prepared <WG2090> my dinner: <WG712> my oxen <WG5022> and my fatted calves <WG4619> are killed, <WG2380> and all <WG3956> things are ready: <WG2092> come <WG1205> to the marriage. <WG1062>
But they made <WG272> light <WG272> of it, and went <WG565> their ways, one <WG3538> <WG3303> to his farm, <WG68> another to his merchandise: <WG1711>
And the remnant <WG3062> took <WG2902> his servants, <WG1401> and entreated <WG5195> them spitefully, <WG5195> and slew <WG615> them.

But when the king <WG935> heard <WG191> thereof, he was wroth: <WG3710> and he sent <WG3992> forth his armies, <WG4753> and destroyed <WG622> those <WG1565> murderers, <WG5406> and burned <WG1714> up their city. <WG4172>
Then <WG5119> said <WG3004> he to his servants, <WG1401> The wedding <WG1062> is ready, <WG2092> but they which were bidden <WG2564> were not worthy. <WG514>
Go <WG4198> you therefore <WG3767> into <WG1909> the highways, <WG1327> <WG3598> and as many <WG3745> as you shall find, <WG2147> bid <WG2564> to the marriage. <WG1062>

So <WG2532> those <WG1565> servants <WG1401> went <WG1831> out into <WG1519> the highways, <WG1327> <WG3598> and gathered <WG4863> together <WG4863> all <WG3956> as many <WG3745> as they found, <WG2147> both <WG5037> bad <WG4190> and good: <WG18> and the wedding <WG1062> was furnished <WG4130> with guests. <WG345>
And when the king <WG935> came <WG1525> in to see <WG2300> the guests, <WG345> he saw <WG1492> there <WG1563> a man <WG444> which had <WG1746> not on <WG1746> a wedding <WG1062> garment: <WG1742>
And he said <WG3004> to him, Friend, <WG2083> how <WG4459> came <WG1525> you in here <WG5602> not having <WG2192> a wedding <WG1062> garment? <WG1742> And he was speechless. <WG5392>

Then <WG5119> said <WG2036> the king <WG935> to the servants, <WG1249> Bind <WG1210> him hand <WG5495> and foot, <WG4228> and take <WG142> him away, <WG142> and cast <WG1544> him into <WG1519> outer <WG1857> darkness, <WG4655> there <WG1563> shall be weeping <WG2805> and gnashing <WG1030> of teeth. <WG3599>
For many <WG4183> are called, <WG2822> but few <WG3641> are chosen. <WG1588>
Then <WG5119> went <WG4198> the Pharisees, <WG5330> and took <WG2983> counsel <WG4824> how <WG3704> they might entangle <WG3802> him in his talk. <WG3056>

And they sent <WG649> out to him their disciples <WG3101> with the Herodians, <WG2265> saying, <WG3004> Master, <WG1320> we know <WG1492> that you are <WG1488> true, <WG227> and teach <WG1321> the way <WG3598> of God <WG2316> in truth, <WG225> neither <WG2532> <WG3756> care <WG3199> you for any <WG3762> man: <WG3762> for you regard <WG991> not the person <WG4383> of men. <WG444>
Tell <WG2036> us therefore, <WG3767> What <WG5101> think <WG1380> you? Is it lawful <WG1832> to give <WG1325> tribute <WG2778> to Caesar, <WG2541> or <WG2228> not?
But Jesus <WG2424> perceived <WG1097> their wickedness, <WG4189> and said, <WG2036> Why <WG5101> tempt <WG3985> you me, you hypocrites? <WG5273>
Show <WG1925> me the tribute <WG2778> money. <WG3546> And they brought <WG4374> to him a penny. <WG1220>
And he said <WG3004> to them, Whose <WG5101> is this <WG3778> image <WG1504> and superscription? <WG1923>

They say <WG3004> to him, Caesar's. <WG2541> Then <WG5119> said <WG3004> he to them, Render <WG591> therefore <WG3767> to Caesar <WG2541> the things which are Caesar's; <WG2541> and to God <WG2316> the things that are God's. <WG2316>
When they had heard <WG191> these words, they marveled, <WG2296> and left <WG863> him, and went <WG565> their way.
The same <WG1565> day <WG2250> came <WG4334> to him the Sadducees, <WG4523> which <WG3588> say <WG3004> that there is no <WG3361> resurrection, <WG386> and asked <WG1905> him,

Saying, <WG3004> Master, <WG1320> Moses <WG3475> said, <WG2036> If <WG1437> a man <WG5100> die, <WG599> having <WG2192> no <WG3361> children, <WG5043> his brother <WG80> shall marry <WG1918> his wife, <WG1135> and raise <WG450> up seed <WG4690> to his brother. <WG80>

Now <WG1161> there were with us seven <WG2033> brothers: <WG80> and the first, <WG4413> when he had married <WG1060> a wife, deceased, <WG5053> and, having <WG2192> no <WG3361> issue, <WG4690> left <WG863> his wife <WG1135> to his brother: <WG80>
Likewise <WG3668> the second <WG1208> also, <WG2532> and the third, <WG5154> to the seventh. <WG2035>
And last <WG5305> of all <WG3956> the woman <WG1135> died <WG599> also. <WG2532>
Therefore <WG3767> in the resurrection <WG386> whose <WG5101> wife <WG1135> shall she be of the seven? <WG2033> for they all <WG3956> had <WG2192> her.
Jesus <WG2424> answered <WG611> and said <WG2036> to them, You do err, <WG4105> not knowing <WG1492> the scriptures, <WG1124> nor <WG3366> the power <WG1411> of God. <WG2316>
For in the resurrection <WG386> they neither <WG3777> marry, <WG1060> nor <WG3777> are given <WG1547> in marriage, <WG1548> but are as the angels <WG32> of God <WG2316> in heaven. <WG3772>
But as touching <WG4012> the resurrection <WG386> of the dead, <WG3498> have you not read <WG314> that which <WG3588> was spoken <WG4483> to you by God, <WG2316> saying, <WG3004>

I am <WG1510> the God <WG2316> of Abraham, <WG11> and the God <WG2316> of Isaac, <WG2464> and the God <WG2316> of Jacob? <WG2384> God <WG2316> is not the God <WG2316> of the dead, <WG3498> but of the living. <WG2198>
And when the multitude <WG3793> heard <WG191> this, they were astonished <WG1605> at <WG1909> his doctrine. <WG1322>
But when the Pharisees <WG5330> had heard <WG191> that he had put the Sadducees <WG4523> to silence, <WG5392> they were gathered <WG4863> together. <WG1909>
Then <WG2532> one <WG1520> of them, which was a lawyer, <WG3544> asked <WG1905> him a question, tempting <WG3985> him, and saying, <WG3004>
Master, <WG1320> which <WG4169> is the great <WG3173> commandment <WG1785> in the law? <WG3551>

Jesus <WG2424> said <WG2036> to him, You shall love <WG25> the Lord <WG2962> your God <WG2316> with all <WG3650> your heart, <WG2588> and with all <WG3650> your soul, <WG5590> and with all <WG3650> your mind. <WG1271>
This <WG3778> is the first <WG4413> and great <WG3173> commandment. <WG1785>
And the second <WG1208> is like <WG3664> to it, You shall love <WG25> your neighbor <WG4139> as yourself. <WG4572>
On <WG1722> these <WG5025> two <WG1417> commandments <WG1785> hang <WG2910> all <WG3650> the law <WG3551> and the prophets. <WG4396>
While the Pharisees <WG5330> were gathered <WG4863> together, <WG4863> Jesus <WG2424> asked <WG1905> them,
Saying, <WG3004> What <WG5101> think <WG1380> you of Christ? <WG5547> whose <WG5101> son <WG5207> is he? They say <WG3004> to him, The son of David. <WG1138>
He said <WG3004> to them, How <WG4459> then <WG3767> does David <WG1138> in spirit <WG4151> call <WG2564> him Lord, <WG2962> saying, <WG3004>

The LORD <WG2962> said <WG2036> to my Lord, <WG2962> Sit <WG2521> you on <WG1537> my right <WG1188> hand, till <WG2193> I make <WG5087> your <WG4675> enemies <WG2190> your footstool? <WG5286> <WG4228>
If <WG1487> David <WG1138> then <WG3767> call <WG2564> him Lord, <WG2962> how <WG4459> is he his son? <WG5207>

And no <WG3762> man <WG3762> was able <WG1410> to answer <WG611> him a word, <WG3056> neither <WG3761> dared <WG5111> any <WG5100> man from that day <WG2250> forth ask <WG1905> him any <WG3765> more <WG3765> questions.
